root.p:
Onwu egbuchughi ji e jiri chu aja, e mesie o pue ome.
If the yam used in sacrifice does not die prematurely, it will eventually germinate.

A chuo aja ma a hughi udele, a mara na ihe mere be ndimmuo.
If the vulture fails to hover at the end of a sacrifice, then you know that something happened in the land of spirits.

Ihu dike na-anyụ mma nkọ.
The mere sight of a hero makes a matchet appear blunt.

Anaghi ezi nwata ọnụ ara nne ya.
You cannot show a baby the way to his or her mother's nipple.

Ndi na-eje mposi abalị na-ahụ ụkpana ndị mmụọ.
Those that go out to defecate at night see the ghosts grasshoppers.

Ogazi machagodu mma, e jighi ya ago mmuo.
Despite the beauty of guinea fowl, it is never used for any ritual.

E gbue maka iwe, e nie maka isi.
If we kill because we are angry, we'll bury because of stench.
